page.title: 12FARMING, BROMSGROVE
page.content: To the west and north-west of Bromsgrove there is a lot of farmland. One of the biggest farms in the area is{Bungay Lake Farm.}They have 231 acres of winter wheat and 30 acres of winter barley. They also keep 20 dairy cows. Another large farm is{Warridge {Lodge Farm.}Here they concentrate on animals. They grow only a small amount of wheat and barley, but they have 150 acres of grass. They keep 200 ewes and 152 cattle. The rest of the area is mixed. There is also a fruit farm called{Array Fruit Farm. Bromsgrove is expanding into the rural land. There have been losses in the agricultural landscape with the building and extension of the M5 motorway.
